name: Hermes [Karlsruhe] (IAPSOP)
content:
Hermes [Karlsruhe] (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Hermes (Karlesruhe) Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Hermes. Eine Zeitschrift in zwanglos Heften zur endlichen Beruhigung für Zweifler und Sucher. 1805 Annual? Karlsruhe, Germany. Language: German. Editor: L. Fr. von Sternhain. Succeeds: Hermetisches Journal (1801) 1/1, 1805. 4 Saxon Thaler a year. Continues pagination of Hermetisches Journal. According to Christopher McIntosh, this was a product of the Hermetische Gesellschaft founded in 1796 by Carl Arnolg Kortun, of which Sternhain became head in 1805. McIntosh identifies him as Baron von Sternhaym of Karlsruhe. Listed in H.C. Bolton, A Select Bibliography of Chemistry, 1492-1902, Second Supplement (Washington, D.C., 1904), 205. Issues:Hermes V1 N1 1805 Hermes V1 N2 1806
